attributes.action: Posthumously strip Dudley Pound of Knighthood and any decorations
attributes.additional_details: Former first sea lord, sir Dudley Pound was responsible for the loss of convoy Arctic convoy PQ17. He ordered that the defensive force of cruisers and destroyers should abandon the convoy, fearing that the German surface raider Tirpitz was near. Even worse, when informed that Tirpitz was still at anchor, he failed to reverse the order and left the convoy to its fate. The man was a disgrace to the service.
